item.title: Removing The Brainwashing
item.description: From when we were born, we were taught things that were false and many lies that I still see people believing, and even myself. What I’m talking about most importantly in this post, which we will focus on and the most thing that many people seem to struggle and get the wrong idea about on how to be free from this trap with the many fear and psychological traps of today day in age of shoving sexual media in our faces and porn.
